page.title: 06CROSTON CLOSE FARM (1)
page.content: All the fields are enclosed by dry stone walls or barbed wire fences.It occupies 78 acres of which only 31 are machineable (the rest is too steep). 48 acres are rough pasture. The farm is worked by only one man. The topsoil has been removed from the best fields leaving only clay. The farmer starts his day at 7 o'clock and works until about 9 at night. His only break is Christmas day. The farmer uses a muck-spreader plough and tractor. The water supply comes from the mains and it takes a full day to fill his storage tanks.
